title: BRIEF-Funko, Funko Acquisition, Funko Holdings, Loungefly Entered Into Amendment
text: March 8, 2018 / 9:47 PM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-Funko, Funko Acquisition, Funko Holdings, Loungefly Entered Into Amendment Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 8 (Reuters) - Funko Inc: * FUNKO INC-ON MARCH 7, FUNKO ACQUISITION HOLDINGS, L.L.C., FUNKO HOLDINGS LLC, FUNKO, LLC, LOUNGEFLY, LLC, ENTERED INTO AMENDMENT NO. 7 TO AGREEMENT​ * FUNKO INC - ‍AGREEMENT PROVIDES FOR A $225.0 MILLION TERM LOAN FACILITY AND A $100.0 MILLION ASSET-BASED REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY - SEC FILING ​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2tsfUeq ) Further company coverage:
